1573256364_1PqMZQ5834GboBvKeEGNxJ5kzt6Ag.body: Or, you know, don't take anyone's word for it. If I wanted folks to tell me what to do I'd have scrolled through some Facebook ads instead of being here.

1572464062_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: Why people would get their panties in a knot over reddit karma, it eludes me. Reddit's karma system validates content on past merit, which is dumb.
